-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sam (John Wayne) and George (Stewart Granger) strike gold in Alaska. George 
sends Sam to Seattle to bring George&#039;s fiance back to Alaska. Sam finds she is 
already married, and returns instead with Angel (Capucine). Sam, after trying to 
get George and Angel together, finally romances Angel, who, in the meantime, is 
busy fighting off the advances of George&#039;s younger brother, Billy (Fabian). 
Frankie (Ernie Kovacs) is a con man trying to steal the partner&#039;s gold claim.

Director: Henry Hathaway

Writers : John H. Kafka
        : Ladislas Fodor

Cast:

John Wayne ...  Sam McCord 
Stewart Granger ...  George Pratt

Kathleen Freeman ...  Lena Nordquist 
John Qualen ...  Logger 
Stanley Adams ...  Breezy
